summary: A New York City film director working on his latest movie in Los Angeles begins to reflect the actions in his movie and real life, especially when he begins an affair with the lead actress.
cast: Harvey Keitel|Madonna|James Russo|Nancy Ferrara|Reilly Murphy|Victor Argo|Leonard L. Thomas|Christina Fulton|Heather Bracken|Glenn Plummer|Niki Munroe|Lori Eastside|John Snyder|Adina Winston|Dylan Hundley|Juliette Hohnen|Julie Pop|Lili Barsha|Robyn B. Ashley|Anthony Redman|Noga Isackson|Randy Sabusawa|Melinda Eshelman|Jesse Long|Linda Murphy|Marta Bukowski|Bill Pope|Martin Schaer|James Fitzgerald|Hiram Ortiz|Howell Caldwell|Richard Belzer|Annie McEnroe|Sammy Jack Pressman|Steve Albert|Bonnie Brennan|Werner Herzog|Ken Kelsch
title: Juego peligroso
